original_text: And they rose up early on the morrow, and offered burnt offerings, and brought peace offerings; and the people sat down to eat and to drink, and rose up to play.
korean_text: 이튿날에 그들이 일찍이 일어나 번제를 드리며 화목제를 드리고 백성이 앉아서 먹고 마시며 일어나서 뛰놀더라

sentences.original_text: And they rose up early on the morrow
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 다음 날 아침에 일찍 일어나

sentences.original_text: and the people sat down to eat and to drink
